About Me

I am a Full Stack Web Developer with a passion for building robust, efficient, and usable software applications.

Software I Can Build for You

I specialize in web applications built with Angular 2+ and backend cloud architectures on AWS. I develop software from the website to the database and everything in between.

Single Page Web Applications

Single Page web apps have the dynamic nature of server generated websites, yet the speed of mobile applications.

Static Web Sites

If you need a simple portfolio to showcase your work or business, this is the way to go. Quickly made and cheaply deployed,

Robust Cloud Architectures

If you need robust, scalable, secure software, I'm cetified to develop on the AWS platform, bringing you solutions without provisioning any servers

My Software Background

I am a Computer Science student at Penn State University. I work at CACI on a web application stack. I have worked with Regavi as their Android Developer, as well as their Lead Developer later on, where I oversaw general software development. I hold the AWS Associate Developer Certification, which signifies that I am capable when working with the AWS cloud framework. With AWS (Amazon Web Services), I build out powerful, scalable, and cost efficient application architectures.
